title: How to get student concession for railway tickets
content: Student concession forms for booking railway tickets are generally made available by the respective hall offices for travel during summer and winter vacations. Accordingly, notices are displayed about a month before the start of the vacations.
Concession is 50Â % on the basic fare. It is for II class seating (2S) & II class sleeper (SL) only.
Booking is allowed only from Kolkata/Howrah/Kharagpur/Hijli railway station directly to your destination railway station.
Entire travel should be made in one leg. Form is not given for a multiple legged journey.
